title: Timothy Malnick
excerpt: Website design and development of a custom Wordpress site for a coach, facilitator and organisational psychologist.
heading: Website design and development of a custom Wordpress site for a coach, facilitator and organisational psychologist.
objective: To create a professional and engaging website that showcases the client's services and expertise.
process: The client provided a detailed brief and content for the site. I designed and developed the site using Wordpress and Oxygen Builder. The site was optimised for SEO and performance.
result: The client was very happy with the site and has received positive feedback from clients and colleagues.
altHero: Screenshot of the hero section from Timothy Malnick's website
altFeatured: Montage of Timothy Malnick's website in the style of Piet Mondrian

title: Jude Lawson Therapy
excerpt: Webflow development of a custom site for a Bristol based counsellor and psychotherapist.
heading: Webflow development of a custom site for a Bristol based counsellor and psychotherapist.
objective: To create a professional and engaging website that showcases the client's services and expertise. Focussing on accessibility and inclusivity.
process: The client provided a simple brief, design system and content for the site. Using a font developed for dyslexic readers and a colour palette that is accessible to all, I designed the site in Figma and developed the final website using Webflow.
result: The client was delighted with the site and extremely grateful for the attention to detail and accessibility considerations.
altHero: Screenshot of the hero section from Jude Lawson Therapy's website
